business.headline: Anil Ambani's Reliance Group faces government probe. What we know so farThe probe escalation follows aggressive enforcement actions by the ED. In the past week, the ED attached assets worth nearly Rs 7,500 crore in connection with alleged fund diversion.

Paytm shares jump 4% despite Q2 profit slip. Here's whyPaytm's profit fell, but stronger operations and MSCI inflows kept investors optimistic. The coming quarters will show if this momentum can last.

Explained: What rising demand for gold says about global economy As inflation worries persist and geopolitical risks grow, is the world turning to gold because economies are strengthening or because everyone is preparing for tougher financial times ahead?

Man calls Zerodha's Rs 5 crore withdrawal limit scam. Expert explains why it's notZerodha, India's largest retail brokerage platform, was blocking an investor's fund withdrawal. He called the incident a "scam" and accused the company of using his money for free.

Finance Buddha IPO: Anchor book oversubscribed before issue opening on November 6The IPO consists entirely of a fresh issue of 50.48 lakh shares in the price band of Rs 140 to Rs 142 per share. The issue opens for subscription on November 6 and closes on November 10.

Paytm delivers Rs 211 crore profit in Q2FY26, driven by AI-Led efficiency and cost disciplineOperating revenue grew 24% year-on-year to Rs 2,061 crore, led by growth in subscription merchants, higher Gross Merchandise Value (GMV), and continued expansion in financial services.

Unconditional cash transfers to women increasing fiscal pressure on states: ReportThe report notes that the number of states implementing UCT schemes for women has increased sharply from just two in 2022–23 to twelve in 2025–26.

entertainment.headline: Older people hide it better, says Twinkle Khanna after her viral cheating remark Twinkle Khanna and Kajol's talk show sparked lively debate as Ananya Panday and Farah Khan joined to discuss modern relationships, affairs, and infidelity.

Meghan Markle makes Hollywood comeback with Brie Larson, Lily Colins' comedy film Meghan Markle has been clicked on the set of a new Amazon MGM Studios movie, marking her first acting appearance since stepping away from royal life in the UK. She will play herself in the film, sharing the screen with actors including Brie Larson and Lily Collins.

Kendall Jenner shares nude beach photos from 30th birthday Model Kendall Jenner recently celebrated her 30th birthday with friends and family. She posted pictures from the celebrations on social media.

Angelina Jolie visits children's hospital in Ukraine amid Russian strikes: Reports Photographs of Angelina Jolie surfaced online as she reportedly visited children's hospitals and maternity wards in Kherson, Ukraine, shortly after the recent attacks, marking her second visit to the country since the conflict began.

5 Vishnuvardhan films that should be re-released after Yajamana As Dr Vishnuvardhan's iconic film 'Yajamana' readies for a grand re-release on November 7 to mark 25 years since its debut, here are five other timeless classics from Vishnu Dada that truly deserve a return to the big screen.

Jennifer Lawrence says trust made intimate scenes with Robert Pattinson easy Jennifer Lawrence has shared details about her experience filming 'Die My Love', explaining why she did not require an intimacy coordinator with co-star Robert Pattinson, and her approach to on-screen nudity.

Chinmayi abused on X for husband's mangalsutra comment, police take cognisance Singer Chinmayi Sripada has faced a surge of online harassment from X users, prompting her to escalate the issue to Hyderabad Police Commissioner VC Sajjanar, who responded by tagging the city's Cybercrime department for action.

Cobra Kai star Xolo Mariduena joins Netflix's One Piece for Season 3 Actor Xolo Mariduena has been cast as Portgas D Ace in Netflix's live-action adaptation of 'One Piece'. The new season is set to premiere in March 2026.

Todd Snider cancels tour after assault in Salt Lake City Singer-songwriter Todd Snider's 2025 tour is cancelled after he was assaulted in Salt Lake City and subsequently arrested, with official statements citing severe injuries and an indefinite break from performances.

KPop Demon Hunters 2 to release in 2029 after Netflix, Sony sign directors 'KPop Demon Hunters 2' officially moves forward, with Netflix and Sony closing deals with directors Maggie Kang and Chris Appelhans for a sequel expected to arrive in 2029.

general news.headline: Trump has a new number for aircraft shot down in India-Pakistan conflictTrump has once again revised his count of jets downed during the three-day India-Pakistan hostilities in May. This, of course, while once again reminding the world of how he played the peacemaker.

How Mamdani has taken the Kejriwal model to New YorkZohran Mamdani's New York City mayoral win is historic, but his free bus ride pledge resembles the Kejriwal Model. AAP leader Arvind Kejriwal wooed voters with free bus rides and other freebies in 2019. Mamdani's socialist schemes, which hint at Indian-style populism, come in NYC, the heart of capitalist America.

28% turnout in Bihar polls, RJD claims power being cut off in 'strong booths'Bihar election 2025: Polling is underway in 121 assembly constituencies spread across 18 districts in the first phase. In 2020, the Mahagathbandhan, led by the RJD, had the upper hand in these constituencies.

Climate change, labour crunch, land loss: Why Kerala's coconuts are disappearingKerala, historically known for its coconut-rich landscape, is witnessing a steep fall in coconut production due to climate shifts, labour shortages and land conversion, pushing prices up and increasing dependence on neighbouring states. Can the state protect its coconut identity?

Live: Phir ek baar, NDA sarkar, PM boasts at election rally in Bihar's ArariaBihar Assembly Election 2025 Phase 1 Voting Live Updates: Voting is underway across 18 districts in 121 constituencies in the first phase of the high-stakes Bihar Assembly polls. Some of the prominent seats in this electoral battle are Tejashwi Yadav's Raghopur; Mahua, where his brother Tej Pratap Yadav is trying his luck with a new political outfit; and Tarapur, from where Deputy Chief Minister Samrat Choudhary is fighting the elections. Polling for the remaining 122 seats will be held in the second phase on November 11. Stay with indiatoday.in for the latest updates.

Travel influencer Anunay Sood, with 1.4 million Instagram followers, diesDubai-based travel influencer Anunay Sood has passed away, as confirmed by his family on Instagram. The family has asked fans to respect their privacy and avoid gathering near their home during this difficult time.

PM Modi's Pep Talk To India's World Cup-Winning Women Cricketers This special report focuses on Prime Minister Narendra Modi's recent interaction with the Indian women's cricket team following their historic World Cup victory. The news bulletin highlighted what was described as 'a very, very interesting and a fun conversation with our champions of the women Indian cricket team that has won the World Cup.' On November 5, 2025, the Prime Minister hosted the triumphant team at his residence, lauding their resilience and remarkable comeback during the tournament. Captain Harmanpreet Kaur and Vice-captain Smriti Mandhana shared how the PM's words have been a source of motivation. The interaction also touched upon the team's journey, with the Prime Minister urging the players to promote the Fit India movement. The report also references the first phase of polling for the Bihar Assembly elections, which commenced on November 6, 2025, for 121 seats.

DRS: Is India's Women's World Cup win comparable to Kapil Dev's 1983 triumph? India's victory in the Women's World Cup — their maiden ICC title after three heartbreaks in previous finals — marks a historic milestone. Rishabh Pant Roars Back! Named Vice-Captain for South Africa Test Series.This special report covers the BCCI's announcement of the Indian Test squad for the upcoming series against South Africa, highlighting the return of star wicketkeeper-batsman Rishabh Pant as vice-captain. According to reports, 'when Rishabh Pant got injured during the England series, it was a big blow for Indian side because you know as far as Rishabh Pant's space in the team India is concerned, always you know everybody rates him very highly'. Pant, who suffered a foot fracture during the England tour in July, has proven his fitness by leading the India A side against South Africa A. The two-match Test series is scheduled to begin on November 14 in Kolkata, with Shubman Gill captaining the 15-member squad.

No Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli in India A squad for South Africa one-dayersIndia A have named Tilak Varma as captain for the upcoming one-day series against South Africa A.
